com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.WorldFeatures

Class Platforms

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.WorldFeatures.Platforms
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlatformFeature

    public class Platforms
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlatformFeature
    Class that implements the logic behind platforms. Used as a component the the gameWorlds.

      • padPlatform

        private void padPlatform(int[][] platformAuxiliarMatrix,
                         int i,
                         int e,
                         com.mygdx.game.Vector2D spacing,
                         com.mygdx.game.Vector2D matrixSize)
        Assures spacing between platforms based of the padding set in the spacingBetweenPlatforms field of this class, and assures the frequency at which the platforms show up based on the set freqPlatforms field of this class.
        Parameters:
        platformAuxiliarMatrix - Auxiliar matrix to know where the platforms are and where there can or can't be a platform.
        i - x position of platform to pad
        e - y position of platform to pad
        spacing - the spacing
        matrixSize - the matrix size
